headline: Adastra Recognized as an Emerging Visionary in Gartner® Emerging Market Quadrant™ for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services
summary: TORONTO, August 28, 2025--Adastra, a leading provider of AI and data-driven solutions, has been recognized as an Emerging Visionary in the Gartner® Emerging Market Quadrant™ for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services.

headline: AI PC adoption slows amid tariff uncertainty
summary: The enterprise takeover of souped up gear slowed this year as the economy soured, Gartner said Thursday.
